name: sbbidv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)), wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wal(s1, wb(w1, w2)), wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), wsb(s0, s1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: Deduction substituting both sides of a biconditional, with ` ph ` and ` x ` disjoint. See also ~ sbbid . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 6-May-2023.) (Proof shortened by Steven Nguyen, 6-Jul-2023.)
